snippet.title: Sonic & SEGA All Stars Racing - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: In a frantic battle to the chequered flag, Sonic & SEGA All-Stars Racing sees Sonic and friends speed around tracks set in of Sonic and SEGA.  Fan favourites such as Dr. Eggman, Tails, AiAi, Amigo and many more will join Sonic in their custom built vehicles, revving their engines and jostling to stay ahead of the pack... castle ramparts, lush rainforests and bustling cities, all taken from the visually rich and varied universes of SEGA.
